text: allah visvasavantayin kerehi ættenma dayava pahala kara ætteya. ovun venuven ek dutayeku (eyat) ovungenma ikutva pahala vimata sælæssuveya. ohu, ovunta ohuge ayavan samudiranaya kara penva, ovunva (papayangen) parisuddha karada tabanneya. tavada ovunta dharmayada, gnanayada uganva denneya. niyata vasayenma ovun mita pera prasiddhiye vu durmargayehimasitiyaha
